title: Linebreak of TextBox 14393 and above vs 10586
body:
Since Windows 10 14393 and above TextBox is producing "\r" for a line break. Where before it was "\r\n".
Environment.NewLine is still "\r\n". Other applications presenting my UWP generated data missing line breaks as result.

comments.body: This one is super annoying and breaking in many apps.  Need a way to at least specify the line ending.
I have opened a feature request for adding this to the backlog. Thanks for your feedback!
